snippet: The Yankees are in unfamiliar territory, squandering, over many weeks and with a grimly gathering speed, a 10-game advantage in the standings.
abstract: New York Yankees are in unfamiliar territory of squandering a 10-game division lead.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are in unfamiliar territory, squandering, over many weeks and with a grimly gathering speed, a 10-game advantage in the standings.

headline.seo: For Yankees, Squandering a Division Lead Is Alien
headline.main: Standing on the Precipice, a Strange Place for the Yankees
headline.print_headline: Standing on the Precipice, A New Place for the Yanks
